entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow mixed with rain beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
